freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign id>${row["id"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign displayName>${row["display_name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign publication>${row["drug_resistance_publication"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug_trial "${id}" custom-table-row drug_trial "${id}" set field display_name "${displayName}" <#if publication != "-"> set link-target drug_resistance_publication "${publication}" </#if> exit </#list>
